channel.title: Setting up SRL for Autoing
channel.description:
[center][b][size=5]Everything SRL:[/size][/b] [b][size=5]by Starblaster100[/size][/b][/center]
[u]Download SCAR:[/u]
[url=http://www.Dylock.net/scar]www.Dylock.net/scar[/url]
[u]Download SRL:[/u]
[url=http://www.villu-reborn.com]SRL[/url]
[u]Install SRL:[/u]
[b]New Video![/b]
Hopefully this will explain it better if you cant follow the instructions below: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_dnk3XuWd-M]Youtube.com[/url] If you cant see that Properly, you can download it from [URL=http://rapidshare.com/files/12280988/Setting_up_SRL_2.avi]Rapidshare.com[/URL]
[b]Text and Picture Installation:[/b]
1) Go to the Includes Folder in SCAR, default path C:\Program Files\SCAR203\Includes Make a New folder called 'SRL' 2) Follow the Picture Setup through Includes --> SRL --> and highlight all of the folders in this rar folder.
Press the big 'Extract to' button (Second from left) and select the path of the new SRL folder you just created.
[img]http://img176.imageshack.us/img176/1663/1op6.jpg[/img]
Note: to Extract .rar files, you need Winrar. Download it from [url=http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm]http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm[/url]
3) It should end up looking like this:
[img]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/6516/2py0.jpg[/img]
4) Reopen the SRL.rar archive, but this time browse into 'Plugins'. Move all 4 files into the 'Plugins' folder in SCAR defualt path C:\Program Files\SCAR 203\Plugins
[img]http://img169.imageshack.us/img169/3576/3qc5.jpg[/img]
5) Copy and Paste this script into SCAR and Run it. If the words "Successfully Compiled" and "Successfully Executed" Appear after about 2 seconds you have set SRL up correctly. IF not, check the errors below:
[php] Program New; {.include SRL/SRL.scar}
Begin SetupSRL; end. [/php]
[u]Errors with SRL:[/u]
[code][Error] Unknown Identifier "SetupSRL;"[/code] - You have not installed SRL correctly. Start over the turotial making sure that the path where you extract all of the folders to is correct.
[code] Include file C:Program Files/SCAR 2.03/.../srl.scar does not exist. Include file C:Program Files/SCAR 2.03/.../skill/fighting.scar does not exist. [/code] - This means that the path to where you have extracted SRL to is incorrect. Maybe you named the folder incorrectly? Maybe you didn't follow all of the instructions properly? Start from Step 1 again.
[code][Error] (11351:1): Unknown identifier 'ProcessPicture' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\AntiRandoms.scar[/code] [code][Error] (11351:1): Unknown identifier 'FindColorSpiralD' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\AntiRandoms.scar[/code] - You havent put the Plugins into the Correct Folder. Follow Step 4 Again until you do. In the pictures above, look at the Path of the Folders. That should help.
And thats it, you are ready to auto with SRL! If you need anymore help Setting up SRL Properly, dont be afraid to ask ;)

and reinstall SRL via File–>Download SRL…

item.title: Setting up SRL for Autoing
item.dc:creator: @jelloman jelloman
item.description:
@jelloman wrote:

i have scar divi 3.12 and ive done the download srl from the file menu and it installed srl, but then when i run this script:

Program New;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

Begin
SetupSRL;
end.

i get this error:

Line 26: [Error] (34:1): Duplicate identifier ‘UpChars’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.12\includes\srl\srl\core\Globals.scar

ive tried to install SRL 4 but i cant figure out how to install subversion-1.4.5
if someone could help me install subversion so i can update srl from scar 3.12 itd be greatly appreciated
by the way great tut star!

Read full topic

item.title: Setting up SRL for Autoing
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

It means you don’t have SRL 4,
I’m fairly sure that SRL 4 isn’t available by File —> Download SRL… and only SRL 3.6 is on Mopar so you have to go to http://www.srl-forums.com/ to get it

item.title: Setting up SRL for Autoing
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

[quote=“0.o, post:160, topic:5527”]Line 26: [Error] (35:1): Duplicate identifier ‘UpChars’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.06\includes\srl\srl\core\Globals.scar

Tried reinstalling about 6 times…[/quote]

Thats because this tut is fro SCAR 2.03

If you have SCAR 3.00+, just press file --> download SRL and it should do it all automatically

Read full topic
